name: HellStar (Brain Jar)
description:
Hack and slash your way to ultimate power.

Gunther has come to the swamp of no return in order to get his hands on the HellStar, a item of immense powers. Unfortunately, the swamp is full of monsters.

Use your fireballs and dagger to slay the minions of the swamp boss. Gain experience from your kills and quickly level up.

CONTROLS
Keyboard:
z: Fireball
x: Dagger
c: Nova
Spacebar: Use/Talk
ESC: Pause Menu

XBOX Controller:
X: Fireball
B: Dagger
Y: Nova
A: Use/Talk
Start: Pause Menu

Created for Black and White GameJam 2021
This game makes use of the psychic swamp tileset created by victoria lacroix.
